title: Can't find my pixel buds 2 using the guide that Google provides. I don't get the find device prompt
content:
I have a P4 XL

Google guides keeps telling me: 

"""Go to Settings and then Bluetooth, and tap the Settings icon by your Pixel Buds name.

Tap Find device.

If your Pixel Buds are currently disconnected, tap Last known location to go to Find My Device""" 

but I don't get the FIND DEVICE prompt on my phone. I can see my pixel buds yes. But there are no prompts for anything

How am I supposed to know where I left them.
